subject: Order MNIURK5PC
description_text:
Can I please get the clutch brackets so the haptic reactors are in the same axis as the pedal movement as commonly requested and mentioned on your social media with my order.

Thanks, kind regards,

Scott Howard

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text:
Correction: Order #SSN3047
I was also meant to order the black version is there a way to amend my order in order to resolve this (obviously happy to pay the difference).

Kind regards,

Scott Howard

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Scott Howard,    Okay, we've replaced the colour for you free of charge and added the clutch mounting bracket.

Thank you very much.

Will leave good feedback once order is replaced.

Regards Scott


Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Order no.SSN3047
Hi,

just wondering if you can let me know what's happening with the shipping as I paid for the express shipping and its still in the US and hasn't moved for nearly a week.

My order was placed on the 21st and has been over six days and not looking to be with me soon (express shipping was meant to be 3-7 days).

Just hoping for an update as to why this is and when its likely to be delivered

Thanks kindly,

Scott.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
